Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: The beautiful legendary garden of the Doloreaux. This garden is one made of dreams, however you can't get close to the floral beauty or the strange and massive blue tree due to the massive gates. On either side of the gates two massive stone gargoyles stand. A golden box is in each of their hands.

Large golden boxes fit in the palm of each gargoyle statue. Each box also has a plaque if you examine it. It reads, "Password said three times plus an offering of heart desire will grant you access to the guardians."

Massive stone gargoyles flank the opening of the stone gate. Each looks menacing and might actually scare you if your weak of mind. Each gargoyle has a golden box resting in it's hands.
Massive stone gargoyles flank the opening of the stone gate.

The massive stone gates block any attempt to get into the garden. It does allow you to see within due the spaces the columns allow but again, it's not enough space for even a tiny person to fit through. Looking really close you see spikes at the top of each column and blood here and there where stupid people have tried to sneak into this garden.
